Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the exterior is slightly grooved and covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393309) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393309)
